title: 打开工作台出现错误
author: xiao_hua666
txt_content:
You are blacklisted from using this item here
出现了这个错误，求解

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
打开residence的flags.yml文件
将最下面的
    Items:
    - BEDROCK
    - LAVA
    - WATER
    - STATIONARY_LAVA
    - STATIONARY_WATER
    - MOB_SPAWNER复制代码
修改为 Items: []
